description: Strange things are happening. Time to send tweets and kick @$$! And we're all outta WiFi. Take on hordes of enemies in this terrifying First-Person Shooter with an immersive and creepy atmosphere.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
